alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 18 at 9:26PM EDT until March 19 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Liberty County in Big Bend Florida... East Central Bay County in the panhandle of Florida... Calhoun County in the panhandle of Florida... * Until 1130 PM CDT /1230 AM EDT/. * At 826 PM CDT /926 PM EDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Blountstown, Springfield, Hiland Park, Bristol, Altha, Frink, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Broad Branch, Red Oak, Kinard, Sharpstown, Scotts Ferry, Blountstown Airport, Chipola Park, Marysville, Chason and Hugh Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
